findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: Active smart contract owner privileges constitute an elevated impact to smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is marked as external and lacks access control, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
